item.title: Technical Resources for Automation and Control Professionals
item.description:
Automation and Control

Handbooks

  • A Guide to the Automation Body of Knowledge (Vernon L. Trevathan)
  • Instrument Engineers’ Handbook: Process Measurement and Analysis (Béla G. Lipták)
  • Instrument Engineers’ Handbook: Process Control and Optimization (Béla G. Lipták)

Optimization and Control

Numerical Optimization

  • Constrained Optimization and Lagrange Multiplier Methods (Dimitri P. Bertsekas)
  • Parallel and Distributed Computation Numerical Methods (Dimitri P. Bertsekas)
  • Network Optimization: Continuous and Discrete Methods (Dimitri P. Bertsekas)

PID Control

  • Automatic Tuning of Simple Regulators with Specifications on Phase and Amplitude Margins (Karl J. Astrom and Tore Hagglund)
  • The SIMC Method for Smooth PID Controller Tuning (Sigurd Skogestad and Chriss Grimholt)

Model Predictive Control

  • Model Predictive Control: Theory, Computation, and Design (David Mayne, James B. Rawlings, and Moritz Diehl)
  • Numerical Optimal Control (Moritz Diehl and Sébastien Gros)
